text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Phew... The cabin should be... there?<n>Just a little farther.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It really is a big star... This sleigh is a<n>lifesaver. And lucky for
me the<n>snow's letting up.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm going to make everyone happy.<n>Just wait a little more!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ah! I think I see Oguri coming! Oguriii!<n>☆

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: She made it back!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Just a little more, Oguri! ♪ Guys,<n>should we go out to meet
her?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Huff! Huff!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Oguri! You can do iiit!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I hear them! I'm almost there! Just<n>hold on...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Crumble!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Huh?! The snow's giving way...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Oh no! Oguri, there's a cliff there!<n>Back away!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: (Back away?)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap just couldn't get ahead.<n>She put everything she
had into her<n>strategy... Do you think she was at<n>her limit?

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Maybe... I can't believe she couldn't<n>pull it off. But... she
tried, right? Yeah,<n>she gave it her all!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
(No. I'm not going to back down<n>again. I'm going to leap
forward... and<n>make up for what I lost!)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
"Taking off"... is when an aircraft<n>gains speed to lift up and
into the sky.<n>Also implied is that it maintains its<n>ascending
trajectory.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: That's it! Time for takeoff! Hraaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Hayahide & Taishin
text_block_list.text: Sh-she jumped!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Come on! I need to go... ALL THE<n>WAY!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Wow, it's Santa! Oguri is Santa!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Wow... ☆ She really became Santa!<n>Right, Marvey? Is this it?!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Yeah! It's sparkly, exciting, andabsolutely marvelous! This is whatwe've been searching for! Amiracle! ☆★

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: There... I... I did it!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Wow! The tree has a star! It's<n>beautiful!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It really is an amazing star. Feels just<n>right for a holiday
spent with friends...<n>Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Child Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Thank you too, Oguri! You were the<n>coolest! It's like Santa
really came!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Oh, really? I was so focused. I don't<n>really remember it...

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
It's true... You pulled the sleigh<n>across the sky, just like
Santa! With<n>this, you've given us another<n>extraordinary
gift.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I did? But I never found anything to<n>give you...

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
You gave us an incredible moment.<n>Seeing you soar through
the air like<n>that, I instantly recalled the excitement<n>of first
watching you race.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
And now I'm certain. In your next<n>race... you're going to
show us an<n>even greater miracle than you did<n>today.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: You're amazing, Oguri!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Oh... Thank you. But I'm the one who<n>received a present
today.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thank you all for coming here for<n>me... Thank you so much.
All your<n>encouragement and support makes<n>me stronger.
So...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I promise to give you that miracle in<n>my next race. Keep
believing in me...<n>And happy holidays!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Happy holidays!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I really should speak with Oguri about<n>her reckless
behavior... Though I<n>suppose everything ended happily.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Well, yeah. And you were finally<n>relieved from Santa duty.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I think our work is done. Let's go<n>back.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Wait, Taishin. I actually helped create<n>a miracle, as you
requested. Do you<n>have anything to say?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ...Don't get all full of yourself, dummy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Heh... Now who's not being honest?<n>Well, you're right. Our
role here is<n>done, so...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Wait, wait, wait! The miracle isn't<n>over yet! Look outside,
everyone! ♪

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Whoa... It's so pretty. We could<n>barely see in front of us
before.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Say hello, starry sky! ☆ Oguri blew<n>away all the storm clouds
with that<n>jump! ★

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: No... It wasn't me. It's because you<n>all wished for a miracle.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hayahide, Taishin, Mayano,<n>Marvelous... I want to thank all
of you.<n>Now let's enjoy the party together!
